books.author: by Julia Quinn
books.description: The first book in the Bridgerton series. Daphne Bridgerton’s reputation soars when she colludes with the Duke of Hastings. The basis of the Netflix series “Bridgerton.”
books.name: THE DUKE AND I

books.author: by Brit Bennett
books.description: The lives of twin sisters who run away from a Southern Black community at age 16 diverge as one returns and the other takes on a different racial identity but their fates intertwine.
books.name: THE VANISHING HALF

books.author: by Stuart Woods
books.description: The 56th book in the Stone Barrington series. Old friends come to Stone’s aid as he takes on an expanding cabal of enemies.
books.name: HUSH-HUSH

books.author: by V.E. Schwab
books.description: A Faustian bargain comes with a curse that affects the adventure Addie LaRue has across centuries.
books.name: THE INVISIBLE LIFE OF ADDIE LARUE

books.author: by Michael Connelly
books.description: The sixth book in the Mickey Haller series. Haller defends himself when police find the body of a former client in his car’s trunk.
books.name: THE LAW OF INNOCENCE

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: The third book in the Jake Brigance series. A 16-year-old is accused of killing a deputy in Clanton, Miss., in 1990.
books.name: A TIME FOR MERCY

books.author: by Julia Quinn
books.description: The second book in the Bridgerton series. Kate Sheffield gets in the way of Anthony Bridgerton's intent to marry.
books.name: THE VISCOUNT WHO LOVED ME

books.author: by Fredrik Backman
books.description: A failed bank robber holds a group of strangers hostage at an apartment open house.
books.name: ANXIOUS PEOPLE

books.author: by Jeanine Cummins
books.description: A bookseller flees Mexico for the United States with her son while pursued by the head of a drug cartel.
books.name: AMERICAN DIRT

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: A doctor serving in the Navy in Afghanistan goes back to North Carolina where two women change his life.
books.name: THE RETURN

books.author: by Matt Haig
books.description: Nora Seed finds a library beyond the edge of the universe that contains books with multiple possibilities of the lives one could have lived.
books.name: THE MIDNIGHT LIBRARY

books.author: by Lucy Foley
books.description: A wedding between a TV star and a magazine publisher on an island off the coast of Ireland turns deadly.
books.name: THE GUEST LIST

books.author: by Julia Quinn
books.description: The fourth book in the Bridgerton series. Penelope Featherington and Colin Bridgerton discover each other's secrets.
books.name: ROMANCING MISTER BRIDGERTON

books.author: by Ernest Cline
books.description: In a sequel to “Ready Player One,” Wade Watts discovers a technological advancement and goes on a new quest.
books.name: READY PLAYER TWO

books.author: by Marie Benedict
books.description: What might have happened during the 11 days in which a rising mystery author went missing in 1926.
books.name: THE MYSTERY OF MRS. CHRISTIE
